trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" /> types to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" /> 類型公開至 UI 自動化。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" /> associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" /> 相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewAutomationPeer" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListView" /> that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" /> is using as a view mode.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListView" />，<see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" /> 會將它當做檢視模式使用。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewAutomationPeer" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Item to create.
trans-unit.target: 要建立的項目。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The item created.
trans-unit.target: 建立的項目。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.IViewAutomationPeer> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewAutomationPeer> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.IViewAutomationPeer> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the element that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得與此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewAutomationPeer" /> 相關聯之項目的控制項型別。

trans-unit.source: A value in the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 列舉中的值。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.IViewAutomationPeer> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewAutomationPeer> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.IViewAutomationPeer> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Collection of child objects you want to get.
trans-unit.target: 您要取得之子物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of immediate child elements of the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] peer.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定之 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]對等個體的直接子項目集合。

trans-unit.source: Collection of child objects.
trans-unit.target: 子物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.IViewAutomationPeer> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewAutomationPeer> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.IViewAutomationPeer> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: A value in the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 列舉中的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern that is associated with the specified <paramref name="patternInterface" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得與指定之 <paramref name="patternInterface" /> 相關聯的控制項模式。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Grid" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Table" />, this method returns an object that implements the control pattern, otherwise this method returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="patternInterface" /> 為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Grid" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Table" />，則這個方法會傳回實作控制項模式的物件，否則會傳回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.IViewAutomationPeer> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewAutomationPeer> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.IViewAutomationPeer> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Data associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: 與事件相關聯的資料。

trans-unit.source: Called when the collection of items changes.
trans-unit.target: 當項目集合變更時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewAutomationPeer> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.IViewAutomationPeer> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Called when the custom view is no longer applied to the control.

trans-unit.source: Gets the total number of columns in a grid.
trans-unit.target: 取得方格中的資料行總數。

trans-unit.source: The total number of columns in a grid.
trans-unit.target: 方格中的資料行總數。

trans-unit.source: The ordinal number of the row of interest.
trans-unit.target: 重要的資料列序號。

trans-unit.source: The ordinal number of the column of interest.
trans-unit.target: 重要的資料行序號。

trans-unit.source: Returns the UI Automation provider for the specified cell.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定之儲存格的使用者介面自動化提供者。

trans-unit.source: The UI Automation provider for the specified cell.
trans-unit.target: 指定儲存格的使用者介面自動化提供者。
